p: Viral RNA was extracted from 150 μl of 10% stool suspension in phosphate-buffered saline (pH 7.4) and was stored at −80°C. A two-step reverse transcription-PCR (RT-PCR) was employed to amplify a 450-bp region of the HuNoV genome encoding for P2. Expand Reverse Transcriptase (Roche Applied Science, Basel, Switzerland) was used for the RT and high-fidelity Pwo DNA Polymerase (Roche Applied Science, Basel, Switzerland) for the PCR. Primers are described in Table 2 and include a template-specific sequence and a universal M13 sequence required in the multiplex Ultra-Deep Pyro Sequencing (UDPS) reaction [ 19]. RT-PCR products were purified from agarose gel bands using the NucleoSpin Gel and PCR Clean-up kit (Macherey Nagel, Düren, Germany) and quantified using a NanoDrop1000 spectrophotometer (Thermo Scientific, Wilmington, DE).
